name: horror powers

talents.info_text: Shows the target the madness of the void. Each turn for 6 turns the target must make a mental save or suffer 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 mind damage as well as resource damage (based off the mind damage and nature of the resource).
talents.message: @Source@ shows @Target@ the madness of the void.
talents.name: Echoes From The Void

talents.info_text: Summons 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 void shards. The void shards come into being destabilized and will suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 temporal damage each turn for five turns. If they die while destabilized they'll explode for 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 temporal and 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 physical damage in a radius of 4.
talents.name: Void Shards

description: Unclassified talents of the various horrors of the world.

name: other

talents.name: Suspended
talents.info_text: The target will not react until attacked.

description: Talents of the various entities of the world.
